rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PR.PRDECOD

datasetVariables.description: Standardized or dictionary-derived name of PRTRT. datasetVariables.label: Standardized Procedure Name

datasetVariables.description:
Identifies the start of the observation as being before or after the sponsor-defined reference time point defined by variable PRSTTPT.
Not all values of the codelist are allowable for this variable. See Section 4.4.7, Use of Relative Timing Variables.
datasetVariables.label: Start Relative to Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: PRSTRTPT

datasetVariables.name: PRENRTPT

description: An interventions domain that contains interventional activity intended to have diagnostic, preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102700, 2018-06-29)
label: Procedures
name: PR
